channel.title: Emote tab tle question!
channel.description:
When i click "home" on the emote tab it teles me home...ok soo... Where would i chnage the location of that tele? (what folder) (what to search)
~I Lured I

item.title: Emote tab tle question!
item.dc:creator: @Different1 Different`
item.description:
@Different1 wrote:

[quote=“Gh0st Jr, post:2, topic:218284”]go to client.java and look up “home” keep looking until you find something like this: } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by me } else { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3489; sendMessage("You teleport to home"); }

then go to the place you want your home center to be and copy those coordinates to the teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3489; thing.

  • Hope this helps,
    Gh0st Jr[/quote]

OMFG, Listen, I can fucking lower that to like 1-2 lines. You all make it so long. Fucking DYQ Right?

You use DYQ?

Read full topic

item.title: Emote tab tle question!
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

Isn’t that for the command “::home”? I’m wanting to change the location when you click “home” on the emote area.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote tab tle question!
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

go to client.java and look up “home” keep looking until you find something like this: } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by me } else { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3489; sendMessage("You teleport to home"); }

then go to the place you want your home center to be and copy those coordinates to the teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3489; thing.

  • Hope this helps,
    Gh0st Jr

Read full topic
